sqlMap.select: select sum(t2.amount) from t_center_out t1, t_center_base t2 where t1.fullid = t2.outid and t1.type = #type# and t1.location = #location# and t2.productId = #productId# and t1.outtime >= #beginDate# AND t1.outtime <= #endDate# AND t1.status in (1, 6, 7, 8, 9)

select sum(t1.curcredit) from t_center_out t1 where t1.customerId = #customerId# AND t1.type = 0 AND t1.pay = 0 AND t1.outTime >= #beginDate# AND t1.outTime <= #endDate# AND t1.status in (1, 3, 4, 6, 7, 8)

select B.id,B.outId,B.productId,B.productName,B.showName,B.showId,B.locationId,B.unit, B.amount,B.mtype,B.inway,B.storageId,B.depotpartId,B.depotpartName,B.owner,B.ownerName,B.price,B.pprice,B.iprice,B.inputPrice, B.costPrice,B.costPriceKey,B.value,B.invoiceMoney,B.description,B.profit,B.profitRatio,B.deliverType,B.expressPay,B.transportPay from T_CENTER_BASE B , t_center_out O where B.OUTID=O.fullid and O.status in(3,4) and O.customerId=#custid# and B.productId in(#proids#)
